729736f-b.title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Flagg Place
729736f-b.text:
Todt Hill Road, north of Flagg Place, showing two
views of Flagg's serpentine quarry.
October 3, 1925
Views 1,2
P. L. Sperr
NO RERRODUCTIONS
729736f-b.folder: Todt Hill Road & Flagg Place, Staten Island, NY

729733f-b.title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Flagg Place
729733f-b.text:
Todt Hill Road, west side, between Flagg Place and Whitlock Ave.
This is a set of three views of the golf links of the Richmond County
Country Club, taken the same day.
July 15, 1925.
Views 1, 2, 3
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
729733f-b.folder: Todt Hill Road & Flagg Place, Staten Island, NY

729734f-b.title: Richmond: Todt Hill Road - Flagg Place
729734f-b.text:
Todt Hill Road, west side, between Flagg Place and Whitlock
Ave. This is a set of three views of the golf links of the Richmond
County Country Club. Views 1 and 2 were taken July 15, 1925, and
view 3 on June 30, 1926.
July 15, 1925.
Views 1 and 2.
View 3: June 30, 1926.
P. L. Sperr.
NO REPRODUCTIONS.
